hiking.name: Mt. Whitney
hiking.description: Experience this 20.9-mile out-and-back trail near Lone Pine, California. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 13 h 0 min to complete. This is a very popular area for backpacking, camping, and hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are April through October.

hiking.name: Breakneck Ridge
hiking.description: Head out on this 3.2-mile loop trail near Cornwall-on-Hudson, New York. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 16 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking and rock climbing, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are April through November.

hiking.name: Old Rag
hiking.description: Discover this 9.4-mile loop trail near Etlan, Virginia. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 5 h 25 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are May through October.

hiking.name: Bull Hill
hiking.description: Head out on this 5.4-mile loop trail near Cold Spring, New York. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 3 h 1 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are April through October.

hiking.name: Mt. Kilamanjaro
hiking.description: Enjoy this 40.8-mile point-to-point trail near Kibosho Magharibi, Kilimanjaro. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 30 h 16 min to complete. This is a very popular area for backpacking, camping, and hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring.

hiking.name: Mt. Tammany
hiking.description: Explore this 3.6-mile loop trail near Pahaquarry, New Jersey. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 20 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring.

hiking.name: Billy Goat Trail
hiking.description: Discover this 3.9-mile loop trail near Potomac, Maryland. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 1 h 18 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking, running, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring.

hiking.name: Humpback Rock
hiking.description: Check out this 3.8-mile loop trail near Nellysford, Virginia. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 15 min to complete. This is a very popular area for birding, camping, and hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are April through September.

hiking.name: Maryland Heights Trail
hiking.description: Enjoy this 6.6-mile loop trail near Harpers Ferry, West Virginia. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 3 h 31 min to complete. This is a very popular area for birding, hiking, and running, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The trail is open year-round and is beautiful to visit anytime.
